fields.name: Standard Room
fields.description: Our Standard Room offers a cozy and peaceful environment, ideal for solo travelers or short business stays. Equipped with a comfortable bed, writing desk, and complimentary Wi-Fi, it provides all the essentials for a relaxing stay without compromising on quality.

fields.name: Luxury Room
fields.description: Experience elegance and comfort in our Luxury Room. This spacious accommodation features high-end furnishings, a deluxe king-sized bed, stylish decor, and a scenic city view. Enjoy premium amenities including a rainfall shower, smart TV, and a fully stocked minibar.

fields.name: Family Suite
fields.description: Perfect for families or groups, our Family Suite offers two interconnected rooms with ample space for everyone to unwind. Featuring multiple beds, a private lounge area, child-friendly facilities, and modern conveniences, it ensures a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all members.
